posts.content:
Hello All!!

We were asked to reproduce a table and cushions for a 1967 Canterbury Pitt.. as a 1966 Canterbury Pitt owner since 1990 I was more than happy to oblige!!

I can't seen to add pictures to this post(my lack of computer skills!!) but though you might like to see what we did so please check out our Facebook page (and become friends too if you want!!) to see the pictures!

Here's the a link;

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id ... 1454216848

Hope it helps someone!!

All the best

Chris
http://www.wonderlandclassics.com
020 8854 4168
